info.name: Earth Domain
info.description: New Cleric domain for the D&D 5e campaign set in the DarkSun setting

sheet.description: The Death domain is concerned with the forces that cause death, as well as the negative energy that gives rise to undead creatures.

description.p: You gain domain spells at the cleric levels listed in the Earth Domain Spells table. See the Divine Domain class feature for how domain spells work.

sheet.description: You gain domain spells at the cleric levels listed in the Earth Domain Spells table.

description.p: When the cleric chooses this domain at 1st level, he or she gains proficiency with martial weapons and heavy armor.

sheet.description: You gain proficiency with martial weapons.

description.p: This ability lasts for 1 minute. A number of small stones equal to your Cleric level will roll towards you or fly towards your enemies. Their attack bonus is equal to your own base attack bonus. This ability does not work if there are no stones present in the surrounding area. Each stone deals 1d8 bludgeoning damage.

sheet.description: You present your holy symbol, and a number of small stones equal to your Cleric level will roll towards you or fly towards your enemies. Their attack bonus is equal to your own base attack bonus. This ability does not work if there are no stones present in the surrounding area. Each stone deals 1d8 bludgeoning damage. This ability lasts for 1 minute.

description.p: Starting at 6th level, you and up to 10 other creatures must be standing on dirt for this to work. You and the targets will sink down into the ground until you hit bedrock or when you go 10 feet plus a number of feet equal to your Cleric level (whichever comes first). During this time you and the targeted creatures need not breathe and will sleep peacefully. You can do this once per Long Rest. This ability lasts for a number of hours equal to your Cleric level.

sheet.description: You and up to 10 other creatures will sink down into the ground until you hit bedrock or when you go {{depth}} feet deep (whichever comes first). During this time you and the targeted creatures need not breathe and will sleep peacefully. You can do this once per Long Rest. This ability lasts for {{level:cleric}} hours.

description.p: You have advantage when attacking Air, Fire, and Water Elementals. Once per long rest attacks that target other forms of Elementals deal maximum damage for one encounter. At 14th level you can use this ability twice per long rest.

sheet.description: You have advantage when attacking Air, Fire, and Water Elementals. Once per long rest attacks that target other forms of Elementals deal maximum damage for one encounter.
You have advantage when attacking Air, Fire, and Water Elementals. Twice per long rest attacks that target other forms of Elementals deal maximum damage for one encounter.

description.p: Once per long rest you can become an Earth or Stone Elemental. This lasts for a number of rounds equal to your Cleric level.

sheet.description: Once per long rest you can become an Earth or Stone Elemental. This lasts for {{level:cleric}} rounds.
